title: Replace About Our Practice placeholder image with uploaded photo

requirements.summary: Swap the About Our Practice section profile image to the provided uploaded square photo while preserving the current square layout and styling.
acceptanceCriteria: The About section no longer displays /assets/generated/ca-profile-placeholder.dim_800x800.png.
The About section image displays the uploaded photo from a static asset path under frontend/public/assets/generated.
The image remains square (aspect-square), object-cover, with the current rounded border, shadow, and border styling preserved.
All user-facing text remains in English.

file_operations.description: Add the required cropped square portrait photo asset (ca-about-photo.dim_800x800.jpg) for the About section image.

Update only the specific About-section (the profile image within the aspect-square container) to use src "/assets/generated/ca-about-photo.dim_800x800.jpg" instead of the placeholder, keeping existing className styling (object-cover) and preserving the surrounding aspect-square/rounded/border/shadow layout; do not modify other sections or text.
